text: 11:6 1 Ning 17:1; Khong 7:17-19; 1 Samu 4:8Makhoina Tengban Mapugi wa phongdoklingei manungda nong chuhandanaba atiyabu thingba ngambagi matik makhoida lei; aduga isingbu ee olhanba ngambagi matik lei, amasung makhoina pamba matam khudingda malemda makhal khudinggi amang atak thokhanba ngambagi matiksu lei.
